name: Cryo Shells
pages: Blast radius: 11.0$(br)Base damage: 4.0$(br2)$(#c0f6fc)$(l)Cryo$() shells cover a large area and specialize in crowd control or high damage against enemies weak to ice.

pages.title: Frostbite
pages.text: Cryo grenades apply the Frostbite III status effect on targets. Each level of Frostbite reduces $(o)Attack speed, movement speed, flying speed, and mining speed$() by 25%.
